app.title: Constellab Fisy
home.title: Build Your Financial Forecast Easily
home.subtitle: A simple and powerful financial forecasting tool for entrepreneurs and business planners
home.desc: Use the menu to enter your assumptions. Subscriptions also feed RR in the summary.
home.feature1.title: Build Your Business Model
home.feature1.desc: A financial forecast helps entrepreneurs consolidate their business model and strategy. Fisy is designed to help you with a simple and effective tool!
home.feature2.title: Validate Cash Flow & Funding Plan
home.feature2.desc: Cash flow management is essential for startup success. Fisy helps you manage your projected cash flow and build your funding plan!
home.feature3.title: Iterate and Improve
home.feature3.desc: A project is built and refined over time. Fisy is a powerful tool to test your assumptions and improve your business plan through iteration.
home.feature4.title: Export to Business Plan
home.feature4.desc: Complete the financial section of your business plan with simple copy-paste to export your forecasts (income statements, funding plan, cash flow, etc.)!
home.why.title: Why Choose Fisy?
home.why1.title: Simple
home.why1.desc: Create a financial forecast in 5 minutes without being a finance expert. Financial modeling has never been easier!
home.why2.title: Interactive
home.why2.desc: Real-time calculations and interactive charts help you understand your financial projections at a glance.
home.why3.title: Reliable
home.why3.desc: Built by experts for entrepreneurs. A proven tool used by thousands of startups worldwide.
home.why4.title: Comprehensive
home.why4.desc: Complete financial statements including P&L, cash flow, balance sheet, and funding plan - all in one place.
config.title: General configuration
activities.title: Activities
activities.desc: Set unit price (ex-VAT), VAT and variable costs.
activities.name: Activity
one_time.title: One-time Sales
one_time.desc: Define one-time sales ranges with monthly growth rate (e.g., 5 = +5%/month).
subs.title: Subscriptions (Recurring)
subs.desc: Define subscription ranges (active per month) with monthly growth. RR is computed in the summary.
staff.title: Staff
staff.desc: Add roles with gross salary, employer cost rate and headcount.
charges.title: External charges
charges.desc: Monthly external charges (ex-VAT) with VAT and active period.
charges.label: Label
inv.title: Investments
inv.desc: Investments (ex-VAT), VAT, purchase month and amortization period.
inv.label: Label
fund.title: Funding
fund.cap.label: Capital label
fund.sub.label: Subsidy label
fund.loan.label: Loan label
zoom.caption: Time range:
results.dashboard.desc: Interactive charts. Displayed unit follows your currency & scale.
cols.marge_couts_variables_ht: Margin on variable costs excl. VAT
